Chapter.Label: Non-isomorphoric Algebras
Chapter.Heading: Small Algebras
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small SkewLattices AllSmallSkewLattices is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic SkewLattices of orders 2 to 7.
<#Include Label = "AllSmallSkewLattices">
The output skewlattices are represented by its operation table for +, *, as given in Section .

Checking Models of Small SkewLattices
"IsASmallSkewLattices" is a function for checking a model against the complete list of non-isomorphic SkewLattices of orders 2 to 7. It returns true if the model is a Small SkewLattices, false otherwise.
<#Include Label = "IsASmallSkewLattices">
